extendedInfo.description: Leave a rating, please!High quality, new glossy dark sphere theme for Next launcher 3D.1) Download theme from market2) Install then tap "Open" - then Yes - then install again.com.gtp.nextlauncher.theme1. Make sure the latest version V1.15 of Next Launcher has been installed! (Search âNext Launcherâ to download)2. Apply the Theme: MENU->Indicidualâ>Installed themes->Choose Sense Next HD theme.3. Apply another wallpaper: "Wallpaper - Next Wallpaper"ORFind Next launcher Sphere theme app and tap on it.

reviews.title: Very clean theme!
reviews.comment: Nice clean theme. Menus are dark but if you don\'t dim you back light it\'s really not a problem. The black glossy icon are awesome if you do switch wallpapers to another similar glossy black glass wallpaper (the original wallpaper is not bad at all though!! :-) keep up the good work!!
reviews.author: Luis Vidal

reviews.title: Dark Clarity!
reviews.comment: This spheres are amazing with the crisp Lines and icon that\'s pop. I\'m giving it 4 stars but only because you need more icons. Especially on the Chat and gaming side of the app list. For example Line Chat and top grossing games like marvel war of heroes, and doubledown Casino. Or make an option where you can put the app work into a sphere. Also a folder sphere. Again thank you and keep up the great work
reviews.author: Brian Mires

reviews.title: More icons
reviews.comment: Looks nice and sharp but let down by lack of icons. I really hate having half my icons on default icons and say the rest on the theme icons!
reviews.author: Keith Fitzroy

reviews.title: Nice,  one problem
reviews.comment: I got for the clear bubble icons.,  the settings menu is black cant see at all ....
reviews.author: Brian Engle
